name: Craft
description: Craft is a versatile note-taking and document creation platform designed to organize ideas, tasks, and projects with a focus on aesthetics and collaboration.
longDescription: Craft is a powerful productivity app that transforms how users write, organize, and manage tasks by offering a sleek, intuitive interface for creating visually appealing documents and dynamic collections. Founded in 2019 and awarded Apple’s Best Mac App of 2021, it aims to bridge form and function, making note-taking and project management both enjoyable and efficient. The platform supports seamless cross-device synchronization, allowing users to work offline and sync ideas automatically when online. Craft serves individuals, teams, and students by providing customizable templates, real-time collaboration, and AI-driven features to enhance creativity and productivity. Its mission is to bring joy to thinking, writing, and collaborating, addressing the frustrations of sluggish, complex tools with a user-friendly, visually rich experience.
features: Create stunning documents with customizable styles, enabling users to personalize their workspace with colors, backgrounds, and over 100 premade templates.
Seamlessly sync notes, tasks, and documents across iOS, macOS, Windows, and web platforms for consistent access online or offline.
Organize ideas using dynamic tables, collections, and databases within documents to manage projects and resources efficiently.
Leverage an on-device AI assistant to adjust writing tone, brainstorm ideas, check grammar, and summarize documents for clearer insights.
Facilitate real-time collaboration, allowing multiple users to edit documents simultaneously with password-protected sharing and custom branding options.
Manage tasks with a native system that supports deadlines, reminders, and drag-and-drop functionality between documents for streamlined workflows.
Export and share documents effortlessly via email, Slack, or browser links, supporting formats like PDFs for professional outputs.
Use folder icons, highlights, and washi tape-style separators to add personality and visual structure to notes and projects.

faqs.question: What is Craft used for?
faqs.answer: Craft is a note-taking and document creation platform designed for organizing ideas, managing tasks, and collaborating on projects with a focus on aesthetics and ease of use.

faqs.question: Is Craft free to use?
faqs.answer: Craft offers a free plan with up to 10 documents and 2 additional documents weekly, plus premium features for students and educators via the Education plan.

faqs.question: Can I use Craft offline?
faqs.answer: Yes, Craft supports offline work, automatically syncing your notes, tasks, and documents once you’re back online.

faqs.question: Does Craft support team collaboration?
faqs.answer: Craft enables real-time collaboration, allowing multiple users to edit documents simultaneously and share them via secure, password-protected links.

faqs.question: How does Craft’s AI assistant work?
faqs.answer: The on-device AI assistant helps adjust writing tone, brainstorm ideas, check grammar, and summarize documents, enhancing productivity and clarity.

faqs.question: Can I customize documents in Craft?
faqs.answer: Yes, Craft offers over 100 premade styles, custom colors, backgrounds, and separators to create visually appealing, personalized documents.

faqs.question: Is Craft suitable for students?
faqs.answer: Craft’s Education plan provides free premium features for students and teachers, ideal for note-taking, organizing class projects, and setting task reminders.

faqs.question: What platforms does Craft support?
faqs.answer: Craft is available on iOS, macOS, Windows, and as a web app, ensuring a consistent experience across devices.
